byline.contributor: Quentin Hardy and Evelyn M. Rusli contributed reporting.

abstract: Research in Motion announces BlackBerry service has returned to normal after week in which technical issues plagued service across five continents.
snippet: Research in Motion said it had resolved the technical issues that plagued service across five continents and that service had begun returning to normal.
lead_paragraph: Research in Motion said it had resolved the technical issues that plagued service across five continents and that service had begun returning to normal.

headline.main: With Apologies, Officials Say BlackBerry Service Is Restored
headline.print_headline: With Apologies, Officials Say BlackBerry Service Is Restored
headline.seo: RIM Says BlackBerry Systems Are Restored
